mapper.select: select fund_no as fundNo, member_id as memberId, fund_name as fundName, fund_amount as fundAmount, fund_fees as fundFees, fund_category as fundCategory, fund_start as fundStart, fund_end as fundEnd, fund_intro as fundIntro, fund_as as fundAs, fund_like as fundLike, fund_reportcount as fundReportcount, fund_warning as fundWarning, fund_filepath1 as fundFilepath1, fund_filepath2 as fundFilepath2, fund_filepath3 as fundFilepath3, fund_filepath4 as fundFilepath4, fund_filepath5 as fundFilepath5 from fund
mapper.insert:
insert into tmp_fund values (ft_seq.nextval,#{memberId},#{tfName},null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null,null)
select max(tf_no) from tmp_fund
